question:
Consider the following statements about Common Risk Mitigation Mechanism (CRMM):
  1. It is an initiative under the aegis of International Solar Alliance
  2. It aims at creating a healthy environment for private sector investment in solar assets
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. The International Solar Alliance (ISA) programme, “Affordable finance at scale” that was launched in 2016 laid the grounds for establishment of a Common Risk Mitigation Mechanism. It aims to mitigate the risk on investment made in solar projects and reduce the overall cost for solar projects globally. <u>Second statement is also correct</u>. It aims to facilitate private investment in solar assets. Banks and multi-lateral institutions can contribute to the risk mitigation fund which will reduce the cost of capital for developing renewable energy projects.
